VISUAL LIBRARY

FINAL RESULT →

A compilation of visual inspirations ranging from paintings and sculptures to typographic design. The final site was created using HTML and Sass within 11ty and utilizes JSON data in order to organize and display each card.

  • SPRING 2021
  • UI DESIGN
  • HTML / SASS
  • JSON
  • JS
  • LIQUID
  • 11ty

PROCESS & GOING FORWARD

This visual library is an assortment of inspirations taken mainly from instagram and organized in my own way. It was created within 11ty using HTML and SASS as well as Shopify's Liquid. The site utilizes JSON data in order to organize relevant information such as artists' names, instagram handles, and my own custom categories. Using Liquid, the site is able to sort and display relevant cards based on assigned categories. Javascript is also used to create a display function in order to gt a better look at individual cards and their information.

One road block that prevents me from using this library more in my daily practice is the lengthy load times. I have looked into a few solutions that I would like to implement in the future such as lazy loading, or even multiple pages in order to split up load times. Regardless, I have used this as a resource on multiple occasions and am very happy with the outcome.
